org.mortbay.io
Interface Buffers

All Known Subinterfaces:
Connector
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBuffers, AbstractConnector, AbstractNIOConnector, Ajp13SocketConnector, BlockingChannelConnector, HttpClient, InheritedChannelConnector, LocalConnector, SelectChannelConnector, SimpleBuffers, SocketConnector, SslSelectChannelConnector, SslSocketConnector
public interface Buffers

BufferSource. Represents a pool or other source of buffers and abstracts the creation of specific types of buffers (eg NIO). The concept of big and little buffers is supported, but these terms have no absolute meaning and must be determined by context.

Author:
gregw
